title: S15 Ep94: Life with the Afterlife w/ Amy Bruni
itunes:title: Life with the Afterlife w/ Amy Bruni
description:
Darkness Radio investigates Life with the Afterlife with guest Amy Bruni
Dave and Tim have a fascinating discussion about the Afterlife with Amy Bruni, co-star of Kindred Spirits and a leading, popular paranormal investigator. Amy has learned a lot about ghosts over her years of research and first-hand experience as part of the wildly successful TV show, Ghost Hunters and now Kindred Spirits.

Today she shares the insights she has gleaned and how it has shaped her unique approach to interacting with the spirits of the dead and those who encounter them.  

Get the book here: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave

Visit her site here: https://www.amy-bruni.net/
